prompt.label: Request (prompt)
prompt.placeholder: Write what you want briefly but clearly: "For 4 people, Turkish cuisine; no oven; 25 min; no chicken; detailed 8–12 steps."

samples.s1: For dinner, 4 servings from Turkish cuisine; no meat but high in protein; no oven; under 30 minutes; detailed 8–12 steps.
samples.s2: Gluten-free snack; no oven; budget-friendly; 20 min; must include chickpeas; write clear steps.
samples.s3: For breakfast; vegetarian; stovetop/pan; few ingredients; 15 min; with a cheesy option; please 8–12 steps.

cuisine.label: Cuisine
cuisine.help: Optional; you can leave it empty.

error.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
